alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Lucie; Inland St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 3:02PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western St. Lucie County through 330 PM EDT... At 302 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northwest of Tradition, or 14 miles northeast of Treasure Island, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Pierce and Fort Pierce South. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Lucie; Inland St. Lucie
